00045 #define ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT 1
00046 
00051 #define ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT 0
00052 
00057 #define ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT 3
00058 
00063 #define ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_ONOFF_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID  CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0000)
00064 
00069 #define ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_OFF_COMMAND_ID 0x00
00070 #define ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_ON_COMMAND_ID 0x01
00071 #define ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_TOGGLE_COMMAND_ID 0x02
00072 
00077 #define ZCL_DEFINE_ONOFF_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES(min, max) \
00078     DEFINE_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE(onOff, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_ONOFF_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_BOOLEAN_DATA_TYPE_ID, min, max)
00079 
00084 #define ZCL_DEFINE_ONOFF_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(onCommandInd, offCommandInd, toggleCommandInd)                    \
00085     DEFINE_COMMAND(onCommand, ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_ON_COMMAND_ID,                                              \
00086                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00087                      onCommandInd),                                                                         \
00088     DEFINE_COMMAND(offCommand, ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_OFF_COMMAND_ID,                                            \
00089                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00090                      offCommandInd),                                                                        \
00091     DEFINE_COMMAND(toggleCommand, ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_TOGGLE_COMMAND_ID,                                      \
00092                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00093                      toggleCommandInd)

00099 #define ONOFF_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00100 { \
00101    .id = ONOFF_CLUSTER_ID, \
00102    .options = { \
00103                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00104                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00105               }, \
00106    .attributesAmount = ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00107    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00108    .commandsAmount = ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00109    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00110 }
00111

00166 typedef struct PACK
00167 {
00168   struct PACK
00169   {
00170     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00171     uint8_t type;
00172     uint8_t properties;
00173     bool value;
00174     ZCL_ReportTime_t reportCounter;     
00175     ZCL_ReportTime_t minReportInterval; 
00176     ZCL_ReportTime_t maxReportInterval; 
00177     bool reportableChange;              
00178     ZCL_ReportTime_t timeoutPeriod;     
00179     bool lastReportedValue;               
00180   } onOff;
00181 } ZCL_OnOffClusterServerAttributes_t;
00182 
00186 typedef struct PACK
00187 {
00188     uint16_t clusterId;
00189     uint8_t length;
00190     bool onOffValue;
00191 } ZCL_OnOffClusterExtensionFieldSet_t;
00192 
00193 END_PACK
00194 
00199 typedef struct
00200 {
00201   struct
00202   {
00203     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00204     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00205     ZCL_Status_t(*onCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t * payload);
00206   } onCommand;
00207 
00208   struct
00209   {
00210     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00211     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00212     ZCL_Status_t(*offCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t * payload);
00213   } offCommand;
00214 
00215   struct
00216   {
00217     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00218     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00219     ZCL_Status_t(*toggleCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t * payload);
00220   } toggleCommand;
00221 } ZCL_OnOffClusterCommands_t;

00223 #define DEFINE_ONOFF_CLUSTER_EXTENSION_FIELD_SET(value) \
00224     .clusterId = ONOFF_CLUSTER_ID, \
00225     .length = sizeof(uint8_t), \
00226     .onOffValue = value
